channel.title: Gardener Review Meetings on Gardener
channel.description: Recent content in Gardener Review Meetings on Gardener

item.title: Gardener Review Meetings 2025
item.description:
Overview

In case you couldn’t participate and are interested in catching up, you can find the contents of the review meetings we have had in 2024 here.

Check back regularly for updates and upcoming topics!

Reviews

2025/04/09 - v1.116 Release

ðŸ“½ï¸ Recording

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@vitanovs 10m ðŸŽ® New ShootState Finalizer Controller #11491
@unmarshall, @Shreyas-s14 10m ðŸ¤– etcd-druid CEL Validations + API Module #11545
@rfranzke 5m ðŸ‘® Bug Fixes In NetworkPolicy Controller #11780
@timuthy 10m ðŸ§© Extensions For Seed Reconciliations #11764
@ScheererJ 10m ðŸ“ GEP-28 Update: Autonomous Shoot Clusters #2906 (issue)

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] Please note, if you configure spec.extensions in your Garden resource: gardener-operator adds a garden- prefix to all extension resources configured via the Garden. Existing extension resources (not prefixed) will be deleted automatically at the end of the reconciliation. […]. #11764
  • ðŸª“ [DEVELOPER] The extension class field in the generic extension controller was removed. Please use the new field classes instead. #11764
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The feature gate NewVPN has been graduated to GA. It was already enabled by default and can now no longer be turned off. The feature gate will be removed in a future release. #11714

2025/03/26 - v1.115 Release

ðŸ“½ï¸ Recording

item.title: Gardener Review Meetings 2024
item.description:
Overview

In case you couldn’t participate and are interested in catching up, you can find the contents of the review meetings we have had in 2024 here.

Reviews

2024/12/18 - v1.109 and v1.110 Releases

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@timuthy 5m ðŸ«£ Virtual Cluster Watch In gardener-operator #10663
@oliver-goetz 10m ðŸ’‚ Node Agent Authorizer #10781
@tobschli 5m ðŸ› Fix Shoot SSH Keypair Rotation #10671
@maboehm 5m ðŸªª Support More Use-Cases For TokenRequestor #10988
@axel7born 5m ðŸ§‘â€ðŸ§’ IPv4/IPv6 Dual Stack Shoots on AWS #10803

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] The deprecated and unconditionally disabled HVPA and HVPAForShootedSeed feature gates are removed. […] #10853
  • ðŸª“ [DEVELOPER] Extension webhooks need to remove the provider type Predicates and add an ObjectSelector against the object’s provider type label instead. #10896
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] seed-authorizer and structured authorization webhooks of shoot kube-apiservers no longer use the default TTL for AuthorizedTTL and UnauthorizedTTL. #10703

2024/12/11 - Hack The Garden Wrap Up

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@damyan 5m ðŸŒ IPv6 Support On IronCore Summary
@LucaBernstein 5m ðŸ’¡ Gardener SLIs: Shoot Cluster Creation/Deletion Times Summary
@Gerrit91 5m ðŸ” Version Classification Lifecycle In CloudProfiles Summary
@rfranzke 5m ðŸ›¡ï¸ Enhanced Seed Authorizer With Label/Field Selectors Summary
@hown3d 5m ðŸ”‘ Bring Your Own ETCD Encryption Key Via Key Management Systems Summary
@MichaelEischer 5m âš–ï¸ Load Balancing For Calls To kube-apiservers Summary
@Nuckal777 5m ðŸª´ Validate PoC For In-Place Node Updates Of Shoot Clusters Summary
@ialidzhikov 5m ðŸš€ Prevent Pod Scheduling Issues Due To Overscaling Summary
@maboehm 5m ðŸ’ªðŸ» Prevent Multiple systemd Unit Restarts On Reconciliation Errors Summary
@rfranzke 5m ðŸ¤¹â€â™‚ï¸ Trigger Nodes Rollout Individually Per Worker Pool During Credentials Rotation Summary
@dergeberl 5m ðŸš Replace TopologyAwareHints with ServiceTrafficDistribution Summary
@oliver-goetz 5m â¬†ï¸ Deploy Prow Via Flux Summary
@timebertt 5m â›“ï¸â€ðŸ’¥ E2E Test Skeleton For Autonomous Shoot Clusters Summary
@tobschli 5m ðŸ«„ cluster-autoscaler’s ProvisioningRequest API Summary
@Gerrit91 5m ðŸ¢ Cluster API Provider For Gardener Summary

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸªª Support More Use-Cases For TokenRequestor. Summary
  • ðŸ‘€ Watch ManagedResources In Shoot Care Controller. Summary
  • ðŸ‘¨ðŸ¼â€ðŸ’» Make cluster-autoscaler Work In Local Setup. Summary
  • ðŸ§¹ Use Structured Authorization In Local KinD Cluster. Summary
  • ðŸ§¹ Drop Internal Versions From Component Configuration APIs. Summary
  • ðŸ› Fix Non-Functional Shoot Node Logging In Local Setup. Summary
  • ðŸ§¹ No Longer Generate Empty Secret For reconcile OperatingSystemConfigs. Summary
  • ðŸ–¥ï¸ Generic Monitoring Extension. Summary

2024/11/20 - v1.108 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@LucaBernstein 10m ðŸ–¼ï¸ Custom Machine Images For NamespacedCloudProfiles #10629, #10811
@dimitar-kostadinov 5m ðŸ’³ TLS Between Registry Cache And containerd #10831, registry-cache#245
@unmarshall 10m ðŸ¤– ETCD Druid v0.23 etcd-druid (release)
@MartinWeindel 10m ðŸ‘©â€ðŸŒ¾ Gardener Operator Deploys BackupBucket/DNSRecord #10645
@istvanballok 10m ðŸ› Gardener Demo Playground demo (website)

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] Fixed an issue that that could occur during control plane migration causing the core.gardener.cloud/v1beta1.BackupEntry to be reconciled after it was successfully migrated, but before it was restored. #10761
  • âœ¨ [USER] The URLs of Shoot plutono, prometheus and alertmanager are now stored as annotations in <shoot-name>.monitoring secret in the project namespace. #10735

2024/11/06 - v1.107 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@timuthy 10m ðŸªª Structured Authorization Configuration #10682
@tobschli 10m â›” Shoot Access Restrictions #10654
@petersutter 5m ðŸ•¹ Recent Gardener Dashboard Features 1.78.0

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] A new required controller was added to gardener-operator. It maintains the RequiredRuntime condition for Extension resources to indicate that the extension deployment is required in the Garden-Runtime cluster. #10650
  • âœ¨ [USER] Gardener reports the cluster’s egress CIDRs in Shoot.status.networking.egressCIDRs if supported by the used provider extension. #10240
  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] The gardener/controlplane Helm chart has been deprecated and will be removed after v1.135 has been released (around beginning of 2026). We urge you to switch to a gardener-operator-based installation. Read all about it here. #10706

2024/10/23 - v1.106 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@plkokanov 5m ðŸ« vpa-recommender Metrics Collection #10517
@grolu 5m ðŸ“Š Dashboard Adaptations In gardener-operator #10572
@andrerun 5m ðŸ“– GEP-29: Autoscaling Storage Volumes #10690
@DockToFuture, @axel7born 10m ðŸ›œ IPv6 Shoot Clusters on AWS provider-aws#1024
@ary1992 5m ðŸŽ® k8s.io/* + controller-runtime Upgrades #10459
@ialidzhikov 10m âŽˆ Kubernetes 1.31 Support #10472

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] The HVPA and HVPAForShootedSeed feature gates have been deprecated and locked to false. Disable the HVPA and HVPAForShootedSeed feature gates if you have them enabled before upgrading to this version of Gardener. #10659
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] Gardener generated certificates are valid 1 minute before issuance to handle some amount of clock skew. #10603
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] Allow gosec to be consumed from gardener/gardener. #10642

2024/10/16 - ApeiroRA Special Edition & v1.105 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@mkorbi, @phyrog 25m ðŸŒ² CO2/Green Monitoring Via Kubecost extension-shoot-kubecost (repo), extension-shoot-kepler (repo)
@rfranzke 5m ðŸŽ± Support For 80+ Worker Pools #10542
@oliver-goetz 10m ðŸ‘¨ðŸ»â€ðŸŒ¾ gardener-operator Deploys Extension Resources #10518

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] When checking whether a Deployment rollout is complete, stale Pods are now ignored and no longer counted. #10548
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] gardenlet now performs garbage collection of stale Pods in all namespaces (except kube-system) in the seed cluster. #10548
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The TopologySpreadConstraint calculation was improved for workload spread across multiple zones. This especially leads to a more balanced distribution of kube-apiserver and istio replicas in seed clusters. #10608

2024/09/25 - v1.104 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@LucaBernstein 5m ðŸªª Custom RBAC Verbs For NamespacedCloudProfiles #10485
@dimityrmirchev 5m âž¡ï¸ Migrating From SecretBinding to CredentialsBinding #10365
@ScheererJ 10m ðŸ¹ Golang-Based VPN Implementation #9774
@ScheererJ 5m ðŸ“– GEP-28: Autonomous Shoot Clusters #10536

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The gardener-operator metrics are now automatically scraped by the garden Prometheus. #10464
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] Alerts based on the proposals_failed_total metric of the etcd cluster are not raised anymore. #10524

2024/09/11 - v1.103 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@dimityrmirchev 10m ðŸ”‘ Token Requestor Controller For WorkloadIdentitys #10298
@LucaBernstein 5m âš™ï¸ New API: NamespacedCloudProfile #10266
@timuthy 10m ðŸ‘¨ðŸ»â€ðŸŒ¾ gardener-operator Deploys Extension Admission Components #10277

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] kube-proxy now has a readiness probe so that a Node will only become ready for workloads after kube-proxy was ready at least once. #10407
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] Host spread for shoots with failure tolerance node (.spec.controlPlane.highAvailability.failureTolerance.type) is now accomplished via minDomains. Earlier, this happened at a best effort basis only. If a seed was having less than 3 nodes at the time the control-plane pods were scheduled, the desired pod distribution was not possible. #10400

2024/08/28 - v1.102 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@AleksandarSavchev 10m ðŸªª Structured Authentication For Shoot and Garden #10244
@ialidzhikov 5m âš™ï¸ VPA Recommender Configurability #10221
@plkokanov 10m ðŸ•´ï¸ Cross-Provider Control Plane Migration #10323
@vicwicker 10m ðŸ“Š Migrate VPA Metrics To CustomResourceState Metrics #9941

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] When the NewWorkerPoolHash feature gate is enabled, the calculation now also rolls worker nodes of Shoots when changing systemReserved in the kubelet configuration. Worker pools are not rolled if the sum of kubeReserved and systemReserved does not change. […] #10290
  • ðŸ› [USER] Fixes a bug preventing shoot clusters with annotation shoot.gardener.cloud/skip-readiness: "true" to be created. #10317
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The .spec.deployment.vpa field in the seedmanagement.gardener.cloud/v1alpha1.{Gardenlet,ManagedSeed} APIs is deprecated and has no effect anymore. It will be removed in a future version. Now, gardenlet deploys its own VPA as part of the Seed reconciliation (after it ensured the VPA CRD exists). #10299
  • ðŸ“– [DEVELOPER] This document now contains a guide for developers how to handle deprecations and backwards-compatibility of changes. #10294

2024/08/14 - v1.101 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@vpnachev 10m ðŸ”‘ token Subresource For WorkloadIdentity API #10042
@nkraetzschmar 5m ðŸ§ Secure Boot On Gardenlinux gardenlinux#2237
@rfranzke 10m ðŸª´ gardenlet Management Via gardener-operator #10161, #10218
@timuthy 10m ðŸªž Registry Mirror Management Via OperatingSystemConfig #10050, #10167

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [DEVELOPER] The IPv4 addresses for the local Gardener setup was changed from 127.0.0.x to 172.18.255.x (default kind subnet) to resolve an issue on developer machines which can’t use additional IP addressed from the 127.0.0.0/8 space. […] #10019
  • ðŸª“ [DEVELOPER] The legacy method of providing monitoring configuration via ConfigMaps labeled with extensions.gardener.cloud/configuration=monitoring has been removed. See this instead. #10220
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] Fixed a bug in the vpa-eviction-requirements controller causing etcds to be evicted for downscaling outside of their maintenance window. #10202

2024/07/31 - v1.100 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

No topics available for presentation, hence, meeting was canceled.

item.title: Gardener Review Meetings 2023
item.description:
Overview

In case you couldn’t participate and are interested in catching up, you can find the contents of the review meetings we have had in 2023 here.

Reviews

2023/12/06 - v1.85 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@timuthy 10m ðŸªª Auto-Registration + Certificate Management for Extension Admission Webhooks #8725
@acumino 5m ðŸ§¹ Orphaned Lease Garbage Collection #8817
@rfranzke 10m ðŸ•µï¸ Introduction Of gardener-node-agent #8023 (issue)

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] All the functionality related to the deprecated field .spec.secretRef in Seeds has been removed and subsequently .spec.secretRef will be dropped from the Seed API in a later release of Gardener. Please check your Seeds and remove any usage before upgrading to this Gardener version. #8833
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The gardener-resource-manager deployment procedure was improved. Earlier, GRM was unnecessarily rolled during shoot reconciliation if worker nodes contained custom taints. #8835

2023/11/29 - v1.84 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@danielfoehrKn 10m â¬†ï¸ Machine Image Version Update Strategies #8275
@plkokanov 5m ðŸ¤²ðŸ» node-exporter’s Textfile Collector #8721
@timuthy 5m ðŸ”„ Improved Shoot Condition Handling #8736
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸŽ® kube-controller-manager Controller Enablement Based on APIs #8763
@aaronfern 5m ðŸš¥ cluster-autoscaler Metrics #8750

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [USER] A validation rule was added that forbids changing the primary DNS provider in .spec.dns.providers as soon as the Shoot was scheduled. #8761
  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] âš ï¸ The deprecated fields spec.settings.dependencyWatchdog.endpoint and spec.settings.dependencyWatchdog.probe have been removed from the Seed API. Please check your Seeds and remove any usage before upgrading to this Gardener version. #8747
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] During the restore phase of control plane migration, the machine-controller-manager is deployed with 0 replicas if it did not exist before or if it existed and was not scaled up yet. This fixes an issue that could cause the Shoot’s nodes to get recreated during control plane migration. #8742
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] Vendoring has been removed from the project, i.e., there is no vendor folder anymore. #8775

2023/11/22 - v1.83 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@Kostov6 10m ðŸ› Prevent Unintended etcd-backup Secret Deletions #8709
@AleksandarSavchev 10m ðŸ“‘ Diki - Gardener Compliance Checker diki (repo)
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸ”Ž API Server Runtime Config Validation #8695
@dimitar-kostadinov 15m ðŸ’¾ Introduction To registry-cache Extension registry-cache (repo)

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] A bug has been fixed which caused ServiceAccounts related to garden access secrets for extensions to leak in the seed namespace in the garden cluster after uninstallation of said extensions. #8697
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The .status.lastOperation in core.gardener.cloud/v1beta1.Seed and operator.gardener.cloud/v1alpha1.Garden resources is now only updated each 5s during a reconciliation. Previously, it was updated immediately when a task was finished. #8705

2023/11/15 - Hack The Garden Wrap Up

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@robinschneider 5m ðŸ›ï¸ ARM Support For OpenStack Extension Summary
@dergeberl 10m ðŸ›¡ï¸ Make ACL Extension Production-Ready Summary
@oliver-goetz 5m ðŸ•µï¸ Continuation Of gardener-node-agent Summary
@rfranzke 5m ðŸ§‘ðŸ¼â€ðŸŒ¾ Deploy gardenlets Through Custom Resource Via gardener-operator Summary
@Kumm-Kai 5m ðŸ¦… Shoot Control Plane Live Migration (Without Downtime) Summary
@afritzler 10m ðŸ—„ï¸ Stop Vendoring Third-Party Code In vendor Folder Summary
@Gerrit91 5m ðŸ” Generic Extension For Shoot Cluster Audit Logs Summary
@timebertt 5m ðŸš› Rework Shoot Flux Extension Summary

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [USER] A discussion about air-gapped shoot clusters was conducted. Summary
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] A new script hack/update-skaffold-deps.sh has been added for automatically updating Skaffold dependencies for the binaries. Previously, you had to update them manually in the skaffold.yaml file. Summary

2023/10/25 - v1.82 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@rfranzke 10m ðŸŒ€ Improved Machine State Persistence For Shoot Control Plane Migrations #8559, #8618
@acumino 5m ðŸ“ No Longer Report Skipped Flow Tasks #8541
@oliver-goetz 5m ðŸš¤ Accelerated API Server Rollouts #8640
@ScheererJ 5m ðŸ’¥ Forceful Managed Resources Finalization #8584

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [DEPENDENCY] The MachineClassKind(), MachineClass(), and MachineClassList() methods have been dropped from the generic Worker actuator’s interface and do not need to be implemented anymore. #8559
  • ðŸª“ [DEPENDENCY] The no longer required --gardenlet-manages-mcm option has been removed. All code in provider extensions related to management/deployment of machine-controller-manager should be removed. #8596
  • ðŸª“ [DEVELOPER] The extensions/pkg/controller/operatingsystemconfig/oscommon package is deprecated and will be removed as soon as the UseGardenerNodeAgent feature gate has been promoted to GA. OS extension developers should start adapting to this new feature, see documentation and example based on provider-local. #8647

2023/10/11 - v1.81 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@holgerkoser 5m ðŸŽ­ Dashboard Theming + Branding dashboard#1568
@seshachalam-yv 5m ðŸ“… Delta Snapshot Retention Period etcd-druid#651
@shafeeqes 10m ðŸ—‘ï¸ Forceful Shoot Deletion #8414, #8608
@rfranzke 5m â„¹ï¸ Shoot Scheduling Failure Reason Population #8527
@himanshu-kun 10m ðŸ”™ Autoscaler Early Abort/Backoff autoscaler#154

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸ› [USER] Gardener refined the scope of the problematic webhook matcher for Endpoints objects. Earlier, shoot clusters were assigned a constraint reporting a problem with a failurePolocy: Fail webhook acting on these objects. Now, only Endpoints in the kube-system and default namespaces are considered for this check. #8521
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The MachineControllerManagerDeployment has been promoted to beta and is now enabled by default. Make sure that all registered provider extensions support this feature gate before upgrading to this version of Gardener. #8526
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The DisableScalingClassesForShoots feature gates has been promoted to GA (and is now always enabled). #8526

2023/09/27 - v1.80 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@acumino 5m ðŸ’½ Enabled Target Cache In gardener-resource-manager #8483
@grolu 5m ðŸ•¹ï¸ Support For Workerless Shoots dashboard#1531
@plkokanov 10m ðŸ“® Introduction To rsyslog-relp Extension shoot-rsyslog-relp (repo)
@rfranzke 10m ðŸŽ® gardener-operator Manages Gardener Control Plane #8309
@oliver-goetz 10m ðŸ”‚ Seed Credentials Renewing On Garden Credentials Rotation #8396
@oliver-goetz 5m âŽˆ Kubernetes 1.28 Support #8479

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸ› [USER] A bug has been fixed which was allowing users to specify an extension of the same type in .spec.extensions[].type more than once in the Shoot API. #8457
  • âœ¨ [USER] Gardener now reports nodes for which the checksum/cloud-config-data hasn’t been populated yet. This could point towards an error on the node and that not all Gardener related configuration happened successfully. #8448
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] gardener-operator now refuses to start if operators attempt to downgrade or skip minor Gardener versions. Please see this document for more information. #8413
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] The following golang dependencies have been upgraded, please consult the upstream release notes and this issue for guidance on upgrading your golang dependencies when vendoring this gardener version: k8s.io/* to v0.28.2, sigs.k8s.io/controller-runtime to v0.16.2. #8464

2023/09/13 - v1.79 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@ary1992 10m ðŸŽ® sigs.k8s.io/controller-runtime@v0.15 Upgrade #8245
@oliver-goetz 10m ðŸ«§ Additional Excess Capacity Reservation Configurations #8356
@ScheererJ 10m ðŸ‘¨ðŸ¼â€ðŸ’» Extension Admission Controllers In Local Setup #8311

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [USER] When the Kubernetes control plane version is at least v1.28, it is now possible to set the worker pool Kubernetes version to be at most three versions behind the control plane version. Earlier, only a skew of at most two versions was allowed. Find more details here. #8402
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The DisablingScalingClassesForShoots feature gate has been promoted to beta. #8428
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The WorkerlessShoots feature gate has been promoted to beta and is now turned on by default. Before deploying this Gardener version, make sure that all your registered extensions support this feature gate. #8417

2023/08/30 - v1.78 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@schrodit 20m ðŸŒ€ How Codesphere Uses Gardener codesphere.com (website)
@acumino 5m ðŸ§‘ðŸ¼â€ðŸŒ¾ Gardener Operator Manages Plutono #8301
@aaronfern 10m ðŸ¥¾ Golang-Based ETCD Bootstrapping etcd-wrapper#3

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] It is possible now to trigger a Seed reconciliation by annotating the Seed with gardener.cloud/operation=reconcile. #8347
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] Status of Garden now includes the ObservabilityComponentsHealthy condition which show the health of observability components in the garden runtime-cluster. #8346
  • âœ¨ [DEPENDENCY] BackupBucket/BackupEntry controllers: watch secret metadata only. #8348

2023/08/16 - v1.77 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@dimityrmirchev 10m ðŸ”’ Use immutable secrets in ManagedResource library #8116
@ialidzhikov 10m ðŸ—‚ï¸ Introduce the ContainerdRegistryHostsDir feature gate #8094
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸª“ Split make generate targets #8289
@oliver-goetz 5m ðŸš® Remove secrets from gardener-controlplane helm chart #8308
@timuthy 10m ðŸŒŽ Enhance minimal distance algorithm in gardener-scheduler #8277

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸ”„ [OPERATOR] gardenlet no longer reports the Bootstrapped condition on Seeds. Instead, it now reports the progress in .status.lastOperation, similar to how it’s done for Shoots. #8290
  • ðŸ”Ž [OPERATOR] Operators can now view and manage dashboards for compaction jobs running in shoot control plane. #8206
  • ðŸ“ˆ [OPERATOR] gardener-operator now takes over management of fluent-operator and vali. #8240

2023/08/02 - v1.76 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@oliver-goetz 10m ðŸ©º Garden Care Controller #8158, #8238
@acumino 5m ðŸ”¢ Error Code Detection In Worker Controller #8242
@dergeberl 10m ðŸ”‘ Garden Cluster Access For Extension Controllers In Seeds #8001 (issue)
@timuthy 5m ðŸ“Œ Support For Custom Gardener Schedulers #8261
@DockToFuture, @axel7born 10m ðŸ”€ AWS IPv4/6 Dual-Stack Support provider-aws#778

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] Removed service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-type: nlb annotation from istio-ingressgateway service template. Set this annotation in Seed configuration. […] #8214
  • âœ¨ [USER] It is now possible to enable disabled APIs for workerless shoot clusters via spec.kubernetes.kubeAPIServer.runtimeConfig. #8258
  • ðŸ› [USER] An issue has been fixed which caused CoreDNS to not rewrite CNAME values in DNS answers. #8231

2023/07/19 - v1.75 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@StenlyTU 10m ðŸ§‘ðŸ¼â€ðŸŒ¾ Gardener Operator Deploys nginx-ingress-{controller,k8s-backend} #7945
@AleksandarSavchev 5m ðŸš” Pod Security Enforcements For Garden And Seed #8099
@acumino 10m âš™ï¸ Kubeconfigs For Admission Plugin Configurations #8110
@shafeeqes 5m âš ï¸ New CRDsWithProblematicConversionWebhooks Constraint For Shoots #8159
@ScheererJ 10m ðŸŽï¸ Race Mitigation For NetworkUnavailable Condition In Nodes provider-gcp#631
@timuthy 5m ðŸª„ Kubernetes Version Defaulting #8198

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [DEVELOPER] Shoot fields .spec.dns.providers[].domains and .spec.dns.providers[].zones are now deprecated and expected to be removed in version v1.87. Please plan ahead to drop using those fields in extensions. #8199
  • ðŸª“ [USER] Adding Gardener-managed finalizers (e.g., gardener or gardener.cloud/reference-protection) to the Shoot on creation is now forbidden. #8209
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] A bug causing the gardenlet to panic when a ETCD encryption key rotation operation is triggered for a hibernated Shoot is now fixed. Now, triggering ETCD encryption key rotation or ServiceAccount signing key rotation is forbidden when the Shoot is in waking up phase. #8184

2023/07/05 - v1.74 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@timuthy 5m ðŸ·ï¸ Multiple Domains For Garden Clusters #8156
@rfranzke 10m ðŸ“ˆ [GEP-22] Improved Usage of ShootState API #8073 (issue)
@rfranzke 5m ðŸ’ª Keep kube-proxy VPA On Kubernetes Patch Updates #8071
@oliver-goetz 5m ðŸ§¹ Removal Of Deprecated Development Setups #8075
@timebertt 5m ðŸ” Usage Of InternalSecret API #7999 (issue)

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] âš ï¸ Gardener does no longer support garden, seed, or shoot clusters with Kubernetes versions < 1.22. Make sure to upgrade all existing clusters before upgrading to this Gardener version. #8087
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] gardener-resource-manager’s system-components-config webhook no longer adds the toleration for the ToBeDeletedByClusterAutoscaler taint to system components in shoot clusters. The ToBeDeletedByClusterAutoscaler taint is maintained by the cluster-autoscaler. This was breaking cluster-autoscaler’s drain mechanism when scaling down an under-utilized node. It was causing just evicted system components from to be deleted node to be scheduled again on the to be deleted node. #8172

2023/06/21 - v1.73 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@voelzmo 10m ðŸ“ˆ Disabled Scaling Classes For kube-apiserver Resource Requirements #8003
@dimitar-kostadinov 10m ðŸŒ Improved Robustness Of terraformer Executions #8059
@rfranzke 10m ðŸ¤– machine-controller-manager Managed By gardenlet #8015, #8018, #8056
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸ§¹ Cleanup Secret Reference In ManagedSeeds #8039

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] The field .spec.secretRef in the Seed API has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release of Gardener. #8064
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] gardener-apiserver now exposes a new core.gardener.cloud/v1beta1.InternalSecret API, see the documentation for more information. #8025
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] It is now easier to annotate Services related to extensions serving webhook handlers that must be reached by kube-apiservers running in separate namespaces such that the respective network traffic gets allowed. Please refer to this guide for all information. […]. #8076
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] gardenlet’s ControllerInstallation controller now populates the feature gate of gardenlet via the Helm values to extensions when they are getting installed. The information is populated via the .gardener.gardenlet.featureGates key. It contains a map whose keys are feature gates names and whose values are booleans (depicting the enablement status). #8011

2023/06/14 - v1.72 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@ScheererJ 5m ðŸ”¦ Virtual Garden API Server Exposure Via Istio #7953
@axel7born 5m ðŸ¹ Golang Implementation For Egress Network Filtering shoot-networking-filter#64
@rfranzke 5m ðŸ“ Improved Accuracy For Local Control Plane Migration E2E Tests #7981
@ishan16696 10m â¬†ï¸ Improved ETCD Cluster Scale-Up etcd-druid#584 (issue)
@kon-angelo 5m ðŸ”§ Live AWS EBS Volume Modifications provider-aws#754
@elankath 5m ðŸ” GCP Disk Encryption With Customer-Managed Keys provider-gcp#607
@MartinWeindel 5m ðŸ“€ OpenStack Manila CSI Driver provider-openstack#572

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] It is required to have ControllerRegistrations for Kinds ControlPlane, Infrastructure and Worker with the same types used for seeds (.spec.provider.type). […]. #7928
  • âœ¨ [USER] The core/v1alpha1 API version is dropped. Make sure that you don’t use the core/v1alpha1 API version in your machinery. #7965
  • âœ¨ [USER] The certificate chains served by kube-apiservers does now include the CA certificates used to sign their server certificates. #7961
  • ðŸ› [USER] A bug that prevented finalizers from being added to referenced Secrets or ConfigMaps in .spec.resources in Shoots has been fixed. #7995

2023/06/07 - v1.71 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸ’¡ Improved Validation For Shoot Worker Pool Config #7855
@ScheererJ 10m ðŸ§‘ðŸ¼â€ðŸŒ¾ Gardener Operator Updates #7881, #7931
@ialidzhikov 5m â±ï¸ Configurable Toleration Seconds For Unready Nodes #7861
@acumino 10m ðŸ•¹ï¸ Workerless Shoot Clusters #7635 (issue)
@ary1992 5m âŽˆ Kubernetes 1.27 Support #7883
@istvanballok 10m ðŸ“Š Replace Grafana With Plutono, Loki With Vali #7318

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [DEVELOPER] Extensions vendoring this gardener/gardener version need to provide RBAC privileges for PATCH apps/depoyments/scale. #7868
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The HAControlPlanes feature gate has been promoted to beta and is now turned on by default. #7867
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] It is now possible to provide namespace selectors for additional namespaces which should be covered by the NetworkPolicy controllers of gardener-operator or gardenlet. […] #7929
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] In order to allow kube-apiserver pods of shoot or garden clusters to reach webhook servers, they must no longer be explicitly labeled with networking.resources.gardener.cloud/to-<service-name>-<protocol>-<port>=allowed. Instead, it is enough to annotate the Service of the webhook server with networking.resources.gardener.cloud/from-all-webhook-targets-allowed-ports=<ports>. #7907
  • ðŸ“– [DEVELOPER] A guideline for developers regarding TODO statements has been introduced. #7939

2023/05/31 - Hack The Garden Wrap Up

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@majst01, @Gerrit91 10m ðŸ•µï¸ Introduction Of gardener-node-agent Summary
@einfachnuralex 10m ðŸŒ IPv6 Shoot Clusters On Cloud Providers Summary
@JensAc 10m ðŸŒ± Experimenting With Masterful Shoot Clusters Summary
@timebertt 10m ðŸ”‘ Garden Cluster Access For Extension Controllers In Seeds Summary
@rfranzke 10m ðŸ’¾ Replacing ShootStates With Backups in Backup Buckets Summary
@timebertt 10m ðŸ” New InternalSecrets API In Gardener Summary

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ The machine-controller-manager deployment procedure has been moved from the generic Worker actuator used in extensions controllers into gardenlet. Summary
  • âœ¨ The accuracy for local control plane migration e2e tests has been increased as much as possible. Summary
  • âœ¨ A few of the necessary steps for supporting ETCD encryption for custom resources have been addressed. Summary
  • ðŸ§¹ The apiserver-proxy-pod-mutator webhook has been moved into gardener-resource-manager. Summary

2023/05/10 - v1.70 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@Kristian-ZH 10m ðŸªµ Introduction Of Fluent Operator #7568
@danielfoehrKn 10m ðŸ§± Move Prow E2E Tests To cgroup-v2 Nodes #7780, #7797
@ScheererJ 5m ðŸŒ½ User-Defined Kernel Settings Per Worker Pool #7825
@rfranzke 10m ðŸ§‘ðŸ¼â€ðŸŒ¾ Gardener Operator Manages Istio and kube-state-metrics #7817, #7836
@plkokanov 10m ðŸ”„ Control Plane Migration For HA Shoots #7626, #7742

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] Gardener now supports seed clusters with Kubernetes versions up to v1.26. #7831
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The highavailabilityconfig webhook configures topology spread constraints with minDomains=<number-of- zones>. […]. #7826
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] Annotations in seed.spec.settings.loadBalancerServices.annotations are now applied to the nginx-ingress load balancer service in the seed cluster. #7835
  • ðŸ§¹ [OPERATOR] The promoted or deprecated feature gates ManagedIstio and ReversedVPN have been removed. #7830

2023/04/26 - v1.69 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@oliver-goetz 10m ðŸž Skaffold-Based Debugging Experience #7755
@plkokanov 10m ðŸ”„ Control Plane Migration For HA Shoots #7626
@DockToFuture 10m ðŸ”— E2E Tests For Networking Extensions networking-calico#257, networking-cilium#261
@breuerfelix 10m ðŸŒ± Local IPv6-Based Seed Clusters #7561

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The SeedChange and CopyEtcdBackupsDuringControlPlaneMigration feature gates have been promoted to GA and are now locked to true. #7763
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] Fixed potential leaks of ShootStates that could happen when a Shoot cluster is deleted. This is achieved by no longer exiting early from the deletion flow if the shoot’s seed Namespace has been deleted. The same logic has been applied to the migration flow for consistency. #7789
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] A bug causing kube-controller-manager to fail to clean up ShootState resources is now fixed. #7793
  • ðŸ§¹ [OPERATOR] The .spec.settings.ownerChecks field of the Seed configuration is deprecated. The “bad-case” control plane migration is being removed in favor of the HA Shoot control planes […]. #7748

2023/04/12 - v1.68 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@ialidzhikov 5m ðŸš¦ Toplogy-Aware-Routing in Garden Cluster #7729
@ary1992 10m â³ Restrict Duration Of Reconciliations #7147
@robinschneider 5m ðŸ”ƒ Copy Docker Hub Images To Gardener GCR #7698
@timuthy 10m ðŸ§‘ðŸ¼â€ðŸŒ¾ Gardener Operator Manages kube-apiserver #7693, #7730
@timuthy 5m ðŸ“¸ Trigger ETCD Snapshots Via API Server Proxy Endpoint #7714

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] Enable memory-saver mode for the VPA recommender. It stops tracking resource consumption for Containers without matching VPAs and frees up memory. #7746
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] The server certificate of the kube-apiserver deployment now contains the <service-name>.<namespace>.svc.cluster.local SAN. #7735
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] A bug causing the gardenlet to be unable to access the BackupBucket generated secret in garden namespace is now fixed. #7708
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] A bug has been fixed for the Gardener Operator that occasionally caused “404 not-found” errors when garden resources where applied and the operator ran with multiple replicas. #7739

2023/04/05 - Special Edition

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@vlerenc 25m ðŸ¤ª Gardener Chaos Engineering chaos-engineering (repo)

2023/03/29 - v1.67 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@himanshu-kun 10m ðŸ¶ Dependency Watchdog v1 dependency-watchdog (repo), #6693
@SimonKienzler 10m ðŸ«€ Ensure CSINode Readiness Before Scheduling Pods #7621
@timebertt 5m ðŸ”„ Skaffold-Based Development Experience #7659
@grolu 10m ðŸ•¹ Recent Gardener Dashboard Features dashboard (repo)
@timuthy 10m ðŸ’¿ Single Object Cache #7632, #7681

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] An issue has been fixed which caused undesired PATCH requests when updating the state in the Worker or ShootState resources. #7637
  • ðŸ› [DEVELOPER] A bug in managedresources.NewRegistry that was leading to excessive memory usage when this function is called multiple times has been fixed. #7694
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] Shoot clusters using provider-local can now have multiple worker nodes with calico as CNI. #7684
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] The local deployment of Gardener with extensions can now deal with multiple seeds. Additional seeds can be added and removed again. #7673

2023/03/15 - v1.66 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸ‘» Dropped Support For Self-Managed Ingress Controllers In Seeds #7529
@timuthy 10m ðŸ§‘ðŸ»â€âš–ï¸ Adapted NetworkPolicys For Istio Namespaces #7570
@ScheererJ 10m ðŸ§‘ðŸ»â€âš–ï¸ Adapted NetworkPolicys For Extension Namespaces #7589
@ialidzhikov 10m ðŸš¦ Routing Network Traffic Toplogy-Aware #7191

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸ› [USER] Updates to the AuditPolicy referenced by Shoots are now also validated against the Kubernetes versions of those shoot clusters. This fixes an issue where it was possible to specify an unsupported audit.k8s.io version when updating the ConfigMap which contains the AuditPolicy. #7563
  • ðŸ› [USER] Fixes control-plane migration of hibernated shoot being stuck if shoot was hibernated for 24h. #7608
  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] The ForceRestore feature gate has been removed. #7543
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The ManagedSeed controller does no longer try to sync the Seed kubeconfig Secret when Shoot’s static token kubeconfig is not enabled. #7546

2023/03/01 - v1.65 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@axel7born 5m ðŸ¥¸ Response Rewrite For DNS Search Path Optimization #7478
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸ” Validation For Admission Plugin Configurations #7472
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸ¥·ðŸ» Recreation For Immutable ConfigMaps/Secrets #7516
@acumino 5m ðŸ©º Shoot System Components Health Checks #7462
@rfranzke 5m ðŸ§‘ðŸ»â€âš–ï¸ Adapted NetworkPolicys For Shoot Control Plane Components #7484, #7515
@Kumm-Kai 10m ðŸ«€ Schedule Node-Critical Pods First #7406

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • ðŸª“ [USER] The core.gardener.cloud/v1alpha1 API is deprecated and will be removed soon. The core.gardener.cloud/v1beta1 API is already available since a very long time and should be used instead. #7443
  • ðŸª“ [OPERATOR] Before upgrading to this Gardener version, Seeds using .spec.dns.ingressDomain must now finally be switched to using .spec.ingress and .spec.dns.provider […]. #7515
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] Fix a bug in the etcd deploy flow that erroneously unsets etcd.spec.etcd.peerUrlTls in the Etcd CRs of high available shoots when marked for hibernation. #7514

2023/02/15 - v1.64 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@rfranzke 10m ðŸ§‘ðŸ»â€âš–ï¸ NetworkPolicy Controller In gardener-resource-manager #7392, #7412, #7437
@himanshu-kun 5m ðŸ—ï¸ Progressing Condition In MachineDeployments machine-controller-manager#762
@kon-angelo 10m ðŸ¤¸ðŸ¼â€â™‚ï¸ Nodes CIDR Expansion For Shoots #7368
@timebertt 5m ðŸ› Simplified Debugging Experience For Integration Tests #7431
@rickardsjp 10m â›™ Unification Of Grafana Deployments #7007

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The istio-system namespace in seed clusters is now labeled with gardener.cloud/role=istio-system. All istio-ingress* namespaces are now labeled with gardener.cloud/role=istio-ingress. #7389
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] When deleting a seed the cluster-identity config map in kube-system namespace is not deleted anymore if it was already existing on seed creation. #7436
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] A bug has been fixed which caused the conditions of Shoots to be set to Unknown too fast in case the responsible gardenlet is no longer posting its heartbeat. #7404
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] Add bootstrapping a local IPv6 KinD cluster with make kind-up IPFAMILY=ipv6. #7388

2023/02/08 - v1.63 Release (Part III)

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@einfachnuralex 10m ðŸ› ï¸ Development Box On GCP #7319
@acumino 10m âš™ï¸ New SystemComponentsConfig Webhook #7204, #7304
@rfranzke 5m ðŸš… Skip Readiness Checks In Shoot Flow #7268
@ialidzhikov 10m âŽˆ Kubernetes 1.26 Support #7275
@SimonKienzler, @breuerfelix 10m ðŸ‘® Access Control For Shoot Clusters extension-acl (repo)

2023/02/01 - v1.63 Release (Part II)

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@AleksandarSavchev 10m ðŸ”’ Disable SSH Access To Worker Nodes #7188
@ary1992 5m ðŸŽ® controller-runtime Refactoring #4251 (issue)
@shafeeqes 10m ðŸ“Š Dashboards For controller-runtime Metrics #7180
@ialidzhikov 5m â›“ï¸ Kubelet Versions Constraints For Machine Image Versions #7265
@timebertt 10m ðŸš¦ [GEP-21] IPv6 Single-Stack Support in Local Gardener #7050, #7246, #7288
@plkokanov 5m ðŸ— Control Plane Migration Status Update #5620, #5587, dashboard#1262

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [USER] The ServiceAccount signing key rotation procedure has been improved and should work better for clusters with lots of ServiceAccounts or intermittent creations/deletions of new/old ServiceAccount secrets. #7313
  • ðŸ› [USER] A bug in the kubelet-monitor script running on all shoot worker nodes has been fixed which was causing to also kill processes other than kubelet only. #7278
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] The legacy VPN solution has been removed. The feature gates ReversedVPN, ManagedIstio and APIServerSNI are unconditionally enabled (locked to their default values) now. #7167
  • âœ¨ [OPERATOR] gardener-operator is now managing the load balancer Service for exposing the virtual-garden-kube-apiserver as part of the virtual garden cluster control plane. It is possible to specify annotations for it via .spec.runtimeCluster.settings.loadBalancerServices.annotations in the Garden resource. #7238
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] When deploying kube-apiserver version v1.24, Gardener will add the --shutdown-send-retry-after=true command line flag to the kube-apiserver command. […]. #7250
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] The HighAvailabilityConfig webhook now also mutates replica settings of HPA and HVPA resources. To make use of this handling, please label respective resources with the well known high-availability-config.resource.gardener.cloud/type label […]. #7226
  • âœ¨ [DEVELOPER] It is now possible to make secrets manager adopt existing secrets. Find out more in this document. #7243
  • ðŸ“– [DEVELOPER] The Gardener project has introduced a policy for the number of supported Kubernetes versions read it here. #7300

2023/01/25 - v1.63 Release (Part I)

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@rgroemmer 5m ðŸ’¿ OpenStack StorageClasses Via CloudProfiles provider-openstack#408
@ScheererJ 10m ðŸ‘¨â€ðŸ‘©â€ðŸ‘§ Highly Available Istio Deployment #6997
@shafeeqes 5m ðŸ‘€ New ObservabilityComponentsHealthy Condition For Shoots #7325
@acumino 5m ðŸ›µ Catching Long-Running Stuck Rollouts #7241

2023/01/18 - v1.62 Release

Demo Agenda ðŸ“‹

Presenter(s) Duration Topic Reference(s)
@dimityrmirchev 10m ðŸª Extension Lifecycle Strategies #6999
@rfranzke 10m ðŸ§‘â€ðŸ’» [operator] ETCD Management, Credentials Rotation, Validation #7067, #7144, #7225
@acumino 5m ðŸ§° Tracking Last Maintenance Operation #7035
@oliver-goetz 10m ðŸ’» kind-Based Local Setup For Extensions #6678
@MartinWeindel 10m ðŸ‘¨â€ðŸ‘©â€ðŸ‘¦ Highly Available VPN Deployment #6978

No Demo, But Still Worth Celebrating ðŸŽ‰

  • âœ¨ [USER] gardener-admission-controller now validates Shoot Kubernetes version compatibility with Audit Policy API version on Shoot update request. #7205
  • âœ¨ [USER] It is now possible to configure the general log verbosity and the verbosity for HTTP access logs for the kube-apiserver via the Shoot specification. #7094
  • ðŸ› [OPERATOR] Prevent updating Shoots which are scheduled to a Seed with less then 3 zones to spec.controlPlane.failureTolerance.type: zone #7195
  • ðŸ“– [DEVELOPER] A new document for developers has been added with a checklist for what to pay attention to when adding new components to garden, seed, or shoot clusters. Read it here. #7125

item.title: Gardener Review Meetings 2022
item.description:
Overview

In case you couldn’t participate and are interested in catching up, you can find the contents of the review meetings we have had in 2022 here. Note that all review meetings in 2022 were SAP internal meetings.

Reviews

Topic Speaker Date and Time Link
Get more computing power in Gardener by overcoming Kubelet limitations with CRI-resource-manager Pawel Palucki, Alexander D. Kanevskiy October 20, 2022 Recording
Summary
Cilium / Isovalent Presentation Raymond de Jong October 6, 2022 Recording
Summary
Gardener Extension Development - From scratch to the gardener-extension-shoot-flux Jens Schneider, Lothar Gesslein June 9, 2022 Recording
Summary
Deploying and Developing Gardener Locally (Without Any External Infrastructure!) Tim Ebert, Rafael Franzke March 17, 2022 Recording
Summary
Gardenctl-v2 Holger Koser, Lukas Gross, Peter Sutter February 17, 2022 Recording
Summary
